text: Timothy Wilson, right wing fanatic, dies in confrontation with FBI while en route to attack a hospital filled with Covid-19 patients in Belton, Missouri. Wilson was under FBI surveillance since last September. Unclear if he killed himself or shot to death https://t.co/ib3LJGwNRb
